snippet.title: Official-METAL GEAR SURVIVE Single Player Trailer | KONAMI (ESRB)
snippet.description:
METAL GEAR SURVIVE will launch on February 20th 2018.

This is the reveal trailer of the Single Player Campaign in the game.

Participate to the METAL GEAR SURVIVE BETA starting on Jan. 18th and experience the 4-Players CO-OP mode!
For details, please check our website.

Metal Gear meets the survival genre, re-discover the franchise in a game where strategy and cooperation are the key to survive.

https://www.konami.com/mg/survive/
